languages.text: "За годы жизни я повидал всякое, и скажу так — эта ловушка может быть зловещим планом хаосопоклонников. А может — шуткой скучающего отпрыска богатого лорда, в котором родители не воспитали мало-мальское самосознание".

traits.locale_text: "За годы жизни я повидал всякое и скажу так — эта ловушка с равной вероятностью может быть зловещим планом хаоситов. А может быть — шуткой скучающего отпрыска богатого лорда, в котором родители не воспитали мало-мальское самосознание".

languages.text: "I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."
languages.original_text: "За годы жизни я повидал всякое, и скажу так — эта ловушка может быть зловещим планом хаосопоклонников. А может — шуткой скучающего отпрыска богатого лорда, в котором родители не воспитали мало-мальское самосознание".

traits.locale_text: "I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could just as easily be a malevolent plan by Chaos followers. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instill in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

"I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could just as easily be a malevolent plan by Chaos followers. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instill in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

"I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could just as easily be a malevolent plan by Chaos followers. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instill in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

"I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

"I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

languages.text: “我这辈子见过很多事情，我可以确切地说——这个陷阱既可能是混沌的仆人的恶毒计划，也可能是某个富有领主的子嗣百无聊赖的恶作剧。看来，他的父母并没有向他灌输最基本的常识。”
languages.original_text: "I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

traits.locale_text: “我这辈子见过很多事情，我可以确切地说——这个陷阱既可能是混沌的仆人的恶毒计划，也可能是某个富有领主的子嗣百无聊赖的恶作剧。看来，他的父母并没有向他灌输最基本的常识。”

languages.text: «A lo largo de mi vida lo he visto todo y puedo decir una cosa. Esta trampa bien podría ser un plan maligno de los esbirros del Caos, pero también podría ser una broma pesada del hijo aburrido de algún lord rico cuyos padres no han sabido inculcarle el más mínimo ápice de sensatez».
languages.original_text: "I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

traits.locale_text: «A lo largo de mi vida lo he visto todo y puedo decir una cosa. Esta trampa bien podría ser un plan maligno de los esbirros del Caos, pero también podría ser una broma pesada del hijo aburrido de algún lord rico cuyos padres no han sabido inculcarle el más mínimo ápice de sensatez».

languages.text: 「これまでの人生ですべてを見てきたけど、一つ言えることは、この罠は混沌の従者たちの悪意ある計画かもしれないし、裕福な領主の自己認識の欠片もないぼんぼんが退屈しのぎにやったいたずらかもしれないってことだ。」
languages.original_text: "I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

traits.locale_text: 「これまでの人生ですべてを見てきたけど、一つ言えることは、この罠は混沌の従者たちの悪意ある計画かもしれないし、裕福な領主の自己認識の欠片もないぼんぼんが退屈しのぎにやったいたずらかもしれないってことだ。」

languages.text: "Ich habe in meinem Leben schon alles gesehen und kann eines sagen – diese Falle könnte ein hinterlistiger Plan von Dienern des Chaos sein, Oder ein Streich eines gelangweilten Nachkommen eines wohlhabenden Lords, dessen Eltern in ihm nicht den kleinsten Hauch von Selbsterkenntnis geweckt haben."
languages.original_text: "I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe in meinem Leben schon alles gesehen und kann eines sagen – diese Falle könnte ein hinterlistiger Plan von Dienern des Chaos sein, Oder ein Streich eines gelangweilten Nachkommen eines wohlhabenden Lords, dessen Eltern in ihm nicht den kleinsten Hauch von Selbsterkenntnis geweckt haben."

languages.text: « J'ai déjà tout vu au cours de ma longue existence et je peux vous affirmer une chose : ce piège est dans doute le fruit d'un plan démoniaque des serviteurs du Chaos. Ou alors, il s'agit d'une farce élaborée par la progéniture oisive d'un riche seigneur, un rejeton à qui l'on n'a jamais su inculquer la moindre conscience personnelle. »
languages.original_text: "I've seen it all in my life, and I can tell you one thing — this trap could be a malevolent plan by servants of Chaos. Or it could be a prank by some bored offspring of a wealthy lord, one whose parents failed to instil in him the barest speck of self-awareness."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai déjà tout vu au cours de ma longue existence et je peux vous affirmer une chose : ce piège est dans doute le fruit d'un plan démoniaque des serviteurs du Chaos. Ou alors, il s'agit d'une farce élaborée par la progéniture oisive d'un riche seigneur, un rejeton à qui l'on n'a jamais su inculquer la moindre conscience personnelle. »
